Author: Tony Crisci
Comment: this test crashes i3 in the present branch

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment:
This check is here for a reason. If we don’t do this, some windows will steal focus and switch workspaces, which is very irritating. I think we’ve seen this with Firefox and/or other browsers.

See commit 68a23b957717c995fd6569af535f2baf91b429b3 which introduced the check.
